Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is more readily accessible than teacher feedback. Meaning, when I require aid or feedback I am able to more promptly and efficiently interact with AI rather than taking up a lectures time. Though, if I have a question I do not feel GenAI has or can adequately answer, I will reach out to my teaching staff. However, I can be hesitant in doing so as I feel that I am wasting their time.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from my teacher has felt more personal than GenAI. Teacher-student interaction has proven to be incredibly motivating and has fostered a sense of community in my field.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback from teacher is more reliable and, is often more relevant to coursework and learning objectives.
